snippet: As Afghanistan girds for its presidential election, an exercise that President Hamid Karzai has shaped at every stage, those hoping to see him retire quietly may be disappointed.
abstract: Those hoping to see Afghanistan Pres Hamid Karzai slip into a quiet retirement soon may be disappointed in the months to come; Afghans will vote in presidential election that he has shaped at every stage, seeking successor he can influence.
lead_paragraph: As Afghanistan girds for its presidential election, an exercise that President Hamid Karzai has shaped at every stage, those hoping to see him retire quietly may be disappointed.

headline.main: Karzai Is Trying to Keep His Sway After Term Ends
headline.print_headline: Karzai Is Trying to Keep His Sway After Term Ends
